Class AbstractDependenceMeasure

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.statistics.dependence.AbstractDependenceMeasure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DependenceMeasure
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CorrelationDependenceMeasure, DistanceCorrelationDependenceMeasure, HiCSDependenceMeasure, HoeffdingsDDependenceMeasure, HSMDependenceMeasure, JensenShannonEquiwidthDependenceMeasure, MCEDependenceMeasure, MutualInformationEquiwidthDependenceMeasure, SlopeDependenceMeasure, SpearmanCorrelationDependenceMeasure, SURFINGDependenceMeasure

    public abstract class AbstractDependenceMeasure
extends java.lang.Object
implements DependenceMeasure
    Abstract base class for dependence measures.

    0.7.0

        Returns:

        data - Data array
        len - Length of data
